titleStmt.title: Terence's comedies: made English. With his life; and some remarks at the end. / By several hands.
Comoediae. English
titleStmt.author: Terence.
Echard, Laurence, 1670?-1730, translator.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Abel Swalle at the Unicorn in Pater-noster-Row,

notesStmt.note: Translated by Laurence Echard and others. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
The fair Andrian -- The eunuch -- The self-tormenter -- The brothers -- The tricks of Phormio -- The mother-in-law.
